data.name: MIND CUBES - Inside the Twisted Gravity Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
A dark gravity-shifting, puzzle platformer, featuring:

◼️ More than 100 mind-bending MINDCUBES
◼️ Even more MINDCUBES will be added over time
◼️ 3 secret achievements are hidden in every MINDCUBE
◼️ Hard to learn, easy to master - wait what? (°ロ°)☝
◼️ The cubes are getting crazy difficult at a later stage - can you beat them?
◼️ Freaking funky dark music ~(˘▾˘~)
◼️ MINDCUBE editor to create your own MINDCUBE and make your friends suffer ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Become a ♥♥♥♥ing, mad, twisted bunny legend! ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ

Self-created MINDCUBES can be shared with the community and we will include a selection of the best MINDCUBES community maps within our updates.
This way other players will know your name and will be able to play your awesome creations!
(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧


◼️FAQ◼️

How long is the play time of the game?
Currently, we have around 100 levels (MINDCUBES) but are still creating more.
How much time you need to finish a MINDCUBE depends on your skill (ง ͠° ͟ل͜ ͡°)ง

How do I share my creations with others?
MINDCUBES does have a steam workshop, so no worries about this (◕‿◕✿)

data.short_description:
The dark gravity-shifting puzzle platformer with twists.
Solve countless MINDCUBES.
Embody your MIND by creating your own MINDCUBES and
make others suffer... MUHAHAHA
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Czech, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or better
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If no soundcard is available, you can still make ambient sounds with your mouth.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: The more the better.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: There is funky music.... so yeah... sounds are pretty awesome.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work. But no guarantee for a potato PC.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: It's more fun with sounds ;)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work. But no guarantee for a potato PC.
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: It's more fun with sounds ;)
